sqlMap.insert: insert into jobs (job_id, job_title, min_salary, max_salary) values (#id#, #title#, #minSalary#, #maxSalary#)
sqlMap.select: select job_id as id, job_title as title, min_salary as minSalary, max_salary as maxSalary from jobs order by job_id asc
select job_id as id, job_title as title, min_salary as minSalary, max_salary as maxSalary from jobs where job_id = #value#
